scripts.copy:assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function copyDir(s,d){if(!fs.existsSync(d))fs.mkdirSync(d,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(s).forEach(f=>{const sp=path.join(s,f),dp=path.join(d,f);fs.statSync(sp).isDirectory()?copyDir(sp,dp):fs.copyFileSync(sp,dp)})};copyDir('admin','dist/admin');copyDir('functions','dist/functions');console.log('âœ“ Copied admin and functions folders')"
